title: Actions
content:
Berserker

Your Rage turns into a frenzy! You gain Frenzied Strike and Enraged Throw. You can also make an Improvised Weapon Attack as a bonus action.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn. You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging

Class needed:Berserker
